connection.title: Connection
connection.realm_danger: Only change if you know what you're doing!
connection.user_info: Self-hosted groups will be fetched from these servers

about.title: About
about.contents: Yamka is an open source messenger with end-to-end direct message encryption and optional self-hosting

tech.title: Technologies
tech.contents:
Desktop client: Tauri, React, TypeScript, Webpack, Babel, Rust
Backend: Elixir, Cassandra
API: AMOGUS
